item.media:text:
I see flashes of who we were, are, could have been
As though reflected in the windows of passing metro trains.

You cannot tell me you love me in your own language,
a language too serious for people like us,
but I see it in your every movement.
I am not so reticent.
I take my heart from my sleeve and pin it to yours.

Chasms pass between us, and doubts circle like wolves,
and we build our bridges and we light our fires,
but I would consume the moon
if it meant you would howl only for me.

Why are we here? My love?

item.title: Wolves
item.media:title: Wolves
item.media:description:
A bit out of what I usually do.

First inspired by:
"I've been running through the jungle
I've been running with the wolves
To get to you"

but then I continued by these words:
"No one's going to take me alive
Time has come to make things right
You and I must fight for our rights
You and I must fight to survive"
song lyrics by Muse - Knights of Cydonia

Large wallpaper size here: http://www.wallpapers.wpgallery.com/digital-art/manipulations/wolves-170.htm

Resources:
Woman and man: www.deviantart.com/daestock/ar… 
Wolf 1: www.123rf.com/stock-photo/3655… 
Wolf 2: www.123rf.com/stock-photo/3540… 
Wolf 3: www.123rf.com/photo_16818766_g…
Leafs: www.123rf.com/photo_41571723_g…
Leafs 2: www.123rf.com/photo_55697998_g…
Iron Suit: www.123rf.com/photo_71332963_s…
Background 1: www.123rf.com/stock-photo/1105…
Background 2: www.123rf.com/photo_13482724_w…
Background 3: www.123rf.com/photo_5276364_sp…
Background 4: www.123rf.com/photo_38668866_f…
Background 5: www.123rf.com/photo_9420967_be…
Water texture: www.123rf.com/photo_37599260_o…

Follow me on Instagram: www.instagram.com/mish_a_man/ and on facebook: www.facebook.com/profile.php?i…

item.title: Bladerunner figurine
item.media:title: Bladerunner figurine
item.media:description:
Another custom, which some were afraid to do, because it seemed to them that it is impossible to carve a creature that stands on the blades of knives And yet I succeeded This is a kind of demonic greyhound who has knives instead of feet. Figurine not posable.

To see more check out my Instagram:
www.instagram.com/kazoo_artdol…

And Etsy store:
www.etsy.com/shop/KazooArtDoll…

OPEN FOR COMMISSIONS!

item.title: The Real Ninja Turtle, Err, Tortoise
item.media:title: The Real Ninja Turtle, Err, Tortoise
item.media:description:
Real ninja turtle. It's real, this is not a joke. #pokerface
Tortoise model Sculpted in Zbrush, rendered in 3DS Max, Corona renderer.

The turtle is actually tortoise, more specifically, Hermann's tortoise. 
I built this 3d model in Zbrush. Everything is hand sculpted and hand painted, meaning I wasn't using any phototextures or scanned alpha brushes in the process.



Tortoise model is available on my gumroad page.
I don't want to post links but if anyone is interested, google damir g martin and gumroad.

item.title: Brandeis
item.media:title: Brandeis
item.media:description:
Break out the patcher...
Decided to make a new base theme because new year and all that, thus this took a while after the screenshot.
Hoping to do a dark version.

Supported builds: 1703,1709,1803,1809.

To determine what build you're on, run 'winver' from the start menu.


How to:

1.Create a system restore point!!!

2.Patch your system using ultraUXThemePatcher: www.syssel.net/hoefs/software_…

Sometimes the patcher may fail to patch your system. Uninstall it and take ownership of the following files in C:\Windows\System32
uxtheme.dll, UXInit.dll and themeui.dll. You may use this: www.howtogeek.com/howto/window…
Install the patcher again

3.Copy contents in the theme folder to C:\Windows\Resources\Themes

4.Select and apply theme from Personalization.

Note: Switch to default theme and uninstall patcher before major Windows 10 update.


Tweaks & Tools:

Install OldNewExplorer to remove the ribbon.
msfn.org/board/topic/170375-ol…
Configuration
imgur.com/a/4vTQzDk

Install Blank it for a cleaner address bar
fav.me/dbnc5q5

You may disable immersive context menus and apply other cool tweaks using Winaero Tweaker
winaero.com/

Hide icons on taskbar buttons and title bars.
www.deviantart.com/niivu/art/T…

Make icons blank: Blank Icon
Customizergod

Taskbar & Start Menu:  www.startisback.com/

Clock: github.com/White-Tiger/T-Clock

Wall: Tracey Hocking

Use Alt + Shift + P and Alt + P to toggle the details pane and preview pane respectively


Credit and Inspiration:

niivu, LukasKokoska, dpcdpc11, mangosango 





Enjoy!
